articles.title: Smart Talk: Looking for strategies to tide over inflation? Dhananjay Sinha shares his mantra
articles.description: 'Global growth is all set to slow down and there is a risk of recession in major economies,' says Dhananjay Sinha, MD and chief strategist, JM Finance Institutional Equity.
articles.content: "Global growth is all set to slow down and there is a risk of recession in major economies," says Dhananjay Sinha, MD and chief strategist, JM Finance Institutional Equity.

articles.author: ANI
articles.title: Bill Gates lauds India's vaccination drive in meeting with Mansukh Mandaviya at Davos
articles.description: Gates said, "It was great to meet Dr. Mansukh Mandaviya and exchange perspectives on global health. India's success with the vaccination drive and the use of technology to drive health outcomes at scale offers many lessons for the world."
articles.content:
A pleasure to interact with @BillGates at #WEF22. He appreciated India's success in #COVID19 management & mammoth https://t.co/C3W4DWgBB7
— Dr Mansukh Mandaviya (@mansukhmandviya) 1653494334000
